Even More Reasons to Buy an Annual Pass!
Launching in 2026: NEW! Space-Themed Experience
LEGOLAND® Florida Resort is charting a course for an out-of-this-world adventure with a space-themed experience set to launch in early 2026 featuring a groundbreaking indoor roller coaster!
Learn More
Hotel Discounts
Enjoy exclusive hotel discounts at LEGOLAND Florida hotels.
Retail Discounts
Use your pass discount to save on your favorite LEGO products!
Seasonal Events
Enjoy new and exciting events all year long, like Brick-or-Treat!
Minifigure Trading
Build and trade minifigures each time you visit the Park.
Pop Badge Collecting
Grow your pop badge collection with new badges all year long.
Granny Apple Fries
You can never have enough Granny Apple Fries! Yum!
Meet & Greets
Hang out with some close friends and meet your favorite characters in the park all year long!
Awesome Rides & Attractions
Set sail and look for lost treasure on Pirate River Quest!
Access to Special Events & Shows
LEGO NINJAGO Weekends
Red, White & BOOM!
Brick-or-Treat
Holidays at LEGOLAND®
All Seasonal Events

Rewards are available to Bronze, Silver, Gold, and Elite LEGOLAND Florida Pass Members unless otherwise noted. Monthly Offers subject to change and/or cancellation without prior notice.

Terms & Conditions
ANNUAL PASS TERMS & CONDITIONS
Monthly Pay payment option is only available to current Florida Residents, and a proof of residency may be required. A contract is initiated at the time of purchase for Monthly Pay Annual Pass. This is a 12-month commitment from the first purchase and down payment, at 0% APR. Following the initial 12 months, your Monthly Pay Annual Passes will be automatically renewed unless cancelled.
Black Friday savings do not apply to monthly pay.
To review your Annual Pass details or cancel once you reach your 12-month commitment, visit
https://www.legoland.com/florida/tickets-passes/passholders-benefits/renewals/
Complimentary
self-parking for Silver and Gold Annual Passes, and complimentary preferred parking for Elite/Platinum Annual Passes, is valid on regular daytime parking only and subject to availability. Additional restrictions may apply, and benefits are subject to change without notice.
Blockout dates apply to Bronze and Silver Annual Passes. Blockout calendars can be viewed at
legoland.com/florida/blockoutdates
Parks, attractions, or entertainment may: close due to refurbishing, capacity, weather, or special events; change operating hours; and otherwise change or be discontinued without notice and without liability to the owners of Peppa Pig Theme Park Florida/LEGOLAND
®
Florida Resort.
SEA LIFE Florida Resort will open soon.
Annual Pass discount does not apply to alcoholic beverages, Florida Wild Side Mini Golf, Pontoon Tours at the onsite hotels, Water Park Cabana rentals, FasTrack products, V.I.P. Tours and Experiences or Stroller and Wheelchair rentals. The discount on retail items may not be available on specific LEGO
®
sets or merchandise during certain promotional time frames. The maximum retail (shopping) discount is $500.00 USD for a calendar year and the maximum daily discount is $200.00 USD. Additional restrictions may apply, and benefits are subject to change without notice.
Hotel rooms at this promotional discount are based upon seasonal availability. Advanced reservations required. Blockout dates, length of stay and arrival/departure restrictions may apply.
Restrictions apply. Prices listed exclude applicable sales tax and are subject to change without notice. Passes are non-transferable, non-refundable and cannot be combined with other offers, separately ticketed events, or discounts. Passes are not for resale. Possessing an active LEGOLAND® Florida Resort Annual Pass does not guarantee entry into the park in case of limited capacity. All pass entitlements that are valid at other Merlin Attractions are subject to each admitting attraction’s guidelines and policies. Passholder must have a valid photo registered with digital Annual Passes and on-hand if using a printed Annual Pass.

Terms & Conditions
ANNUAL PASS TERMS & CONDITIONS
Monthly Pay payment option is only available to current Florida Residents, and a proof of residency may be required. A contract is initiated at the time of purchase for Monthly Pay Annual Pass. This is a 12-month commitment from the first purchase and down payment, at 0% APR. Following the initial 12 months, your Monthly Pay Annual Passes will be automatically renewed unless cancelled.
Black Friday savings do not apply to monthly pay.
To review your Annual Pass details or cancel once you reach your 12-month commitment, visit
https://www.legoland.com/florida/tickets-passes/passholders-benefits/renewals/
Complimentary
self-parking for Silver and Gold Annual Passes, and complimentary preferred parking for Elite/Platinum Annual Passes, is valid on regular daytime parking only and subject to availability. Additional restrictions may apply, and benefits are subject to change without notice.
Blockout dates apply to Bronze and Silver Annual Passes. Blockout calendars can be viewed at
legoland.com/florida/blockoutdates
Parks, attractions, or entertainment may: close due to refurbishing, capacity, weather, or special events; change operating hours; and otherwise change or be discontinued without notice and without liability to the owners of Peppa Pig Theme Park Florida/LEGOLAND
®
Florida Resort.
SEA LIFE Florida Resort will open soon.
Annual Pass discount does not apply to alcoholic beverages, Florida Wild Side Mini Golf, Pontoon Tours at the onsite hotels, Water Park Cabana rentals, FasTrack products, V.I.P. Tours and Experiences or Stroller and Wheelchair rentals. The discount on retail items may not be available on specific LEGO
®
sets or merchandise during certain promotional time frames. The maximum retail (shopping) discount is $500.00 USD for a calendar year and the maximum daily discount is $200.00 USD. Additional restrictions may apply, and benefits are subject to change without notice.
Hotel rooms at this promotional discount are based upon seasonal availability. Advanced reservations required. Blockout dates, length of stay and arrival/departure restrictions may apply.
Restrictions apply. Prices listed exclude applicable sales tax and are subject to change without notice. Passes are non-transferable, non-refundable and cannot be combined with other offers, separately ticketed events, or discounts. Passes are not for resale. Possessing an active LEGOLAND® Florida Resort Annual Pass does not guarantee entry into the park in case of limited capacity. All pass entitlements that are valid at other Merlin Attractions are subject to each admitting attraction’s guidelines and policies. Passholder must have a valid photo registered with digital Annual Passes and on-hand if using a printed Annual Pass.

About LEGOLAND®
Fun, colourful and inspirational, LEGOLAND® is where awesome awaits for families looking for a great day out, or the ultimate shortbreak experience. Each LEGOLAND is bursting with interactive family rides, live shows, building workshops, and amazing attractions, including awe-inspiring Miniland areas reflecting iconic buildings and attractions from the Resort location – all built using the iconic LEGO® brick. Designed specifically for families with children aged 2-12 years old, we have LEGOLAND Resorts all over the world.
Families can extend their stay with our amazing, LEGO themed hotels and accommodation – from the classic LEGOLAND Hotels in Denmark, the UK, California, Florida and Malaysia, the awesome LEGOLAND Castle Hotels in Germany, to our amazing LEGOLAND Holiday Villages in Denmark and Germany. New in 2017, we also introduce the LEGOLAND Beach Retreat in Florida, the LEGOLAND Castle Hotel in the UK, and a new expansion to the Holiday Village in Denmark featuring our first LEGO Ninjago themed lodges.

Families can extend their stay with our amazing, LEGO themed hotels and accommodation – from the classic LEGOLAND Hotels in Denmark, the UK, California, Florida and Malaysia, the awesome LEGOLAND Castle Hotels in Germany, to our amazing LEGOLAND Holiday Villages in Denmark and Germany. New in 2017, we also introduce the LEGOLAND Beach Retreat in Florida, the LEGOLAND Castle Hotel in the UK, and a new expansion to the Holiday Village in Denmark featuring our first LEGO Ninjago themed lodges.

For Hotel related enquiries please contact us on +971 4 825 1650

About LEGOLAND Florida Resort
LEGOLAND
®
Florida Resort is the place where kids rule! It's where princesses, knights, and adventurers roam; where dragons soar, castles are stormed, and pirates sail the seven seas. We are truly the ultimate multi-day vacation destination for families with young kids. Here, imagination comes to life with over 50 rides, shows and attractions at the Theme Park, 14 water slides in the Water Park, 3 unique themed Hotels and more!
Here are the top things you won't want to miss when you visit the Resort!
Take a stroll through Bricksburg in THE LEGO® MOVIE™ WORLD: an AWESOME land that brings THE LEGO
®
MOVIE™ to life with three immersive rides, including Masters of Flight, Unikitty’s Disco Drop, and the Battle of Bricksburg water ride. Before you go, meet Emmet & the gang, grab a bite to eat, or shop in downtown Bricksburg!
Immerse yourself in LEGO® NINJAGO® World: After mastering the elements, blast animated fireballs, lightning, and more at a sinister gallery of villains before teaming up to defeat a powerful foe in LEGO® NINJAGO® The Ride. Track your score against friends, family, and other guests, then ride again! And don’t forget to strike your best ninja pose for a picture alongside your NINJAGO® friends.
Enjoy Live Entertainment: Whether playing for the day or staying overnight, there is endless entertainment that will keep you coming back for more!
Seasonal Events: LEGOLAND Florida offers a variety of seasonal events. Whether it’s summer fun, spooky tales, or holiday cheer, you’ll be entertained year-round! Celebrate America’s independence during Red, White and BOOM! with special limited-time treats, fun activities, and the biggest 3D LEGO brick-bursting fireworks show of the year! Brick-or-Treat presents Monster Party returns on select dates this Fall for a ghoulishly good time including exclusive LEGO characters and TONS of candy!
Families can also enjoy the most wonderful time of the year with Holidays at LEGOLAND, during select dates in November and December.
Chow down on Granny's Apple Fries: a local favorite and signature treat invented here at LEGOLAND! We cook Granny Smith apples, dust them with cinnamon sugar, add some secret ingredients and serve them with a vanilla cream dipping sauce. Can you say YUM!?
Shop until you drop! Unleash the power of play with your favorite LEGO toys, LEGOLAND apparel, exclusive LEGOLAND sets and much more in the many shops found throughout the Resort! Whether you’re looking to build the tallest tower, a flying pig on an airplane, or simply get the newest building set, LEGOLAND has thousands of colorful LEGO bricks awaiting assembly into whatever your imagination can, well, imagine!
